Literature.Title: Dilipid ultrashort cationic lipopeptides as adjuvants for chloramphenicol and other conventional antibiotics against Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Domalaon R, Brizuela M, Eisner B, Findlay B, Zhanel GG, Schweizer F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis CANWARD-2008 81388(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis CAN-ICU 61589(MIC=512µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=512µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 27270(MIC=512µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>512µg/ml),Escherichia coli CAN-ICU 61714(MIC=>512µg/ml),Escherichia coli CAN-ICU 63074(MIC=512µg/ml),Escherichia coli CANWARD-2011 97615(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CAN-ICU 62308(MIC=512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CANWARD-2011 96846(MIC=>512µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia CAN-ICU 62584(MIC=>512µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii CAN-ICU 63169(MIC=>512µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µg/ml)
